### newmark_with_damping { #skrom.utils.dynamics.newmark_beta.newmark_with_damping }

```python
utils.dynamics.newmark_beta.newmark_with_damping(
    M,
    C,
    K,
    force_free,
    times,
    U0=None,
    V0=None,
    beta=0.25,
    gamma=0.5,
)
```

Newmark-β integrator with Rayleigh damping C.
Uses copies of input matrices to avoid side effects.
force_free(i, times) must return the load vector at times[i].
